works.description:
The album, in Lolly's Gallery, named  
Noah's Ark, contains 11 scanned images of each page of Alan Dart's  
copyrighted knitting pattern. The quality of each scan is such that, by  
downloading the images, the whole pattern can be illegally obtained. This 

infringes Alan's copyright, and that of Future Publishing. Below is the  
album's url.
